title: (07620) Llucmajor - 70 Ronda de Migjorn
description: There is a small launderette here, there is also a vacuum cleaner and fresh water from a 3/4 inch faucet. The entrance is limited in height on one side, on the other side you can even get into the yard with trucks. The burger shop next door is fantastically delicious, perfect for waiting for the fresh laundry

title: (07620) - 190 Lugar Poligono 11
description:
We offer the land of our house for camping travelers. It is a flat and spacious land with some large carob trees.
We have a large pool, children's trampoline and access to bathroom with shower.
We are 5 minutes from the town of Llucmajor and 30 minutes from the capital, Palma.
Ask for availability

title: (07629) Algaida - 503 Ma-5018
description: Nice view, a bit of aircraft noise, theoretically limited to 2.5t (had no problems with 3.5t) -> police came by and tolerated camping for 1 day

title: (07629) Algaida - 30 Carrer de la Iglésia
description: Parking on the outskirts

title: (07629) Algaida -
description: Away from the street on the Randa. Only partially suitable for larger motorhomes. At the weekend it gets crowded and noisy youngsters can come in the evenings.

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018
description: A great place to stay. During the day some cars and cyclists on the way to the monastery. Magnificent view over the valley. You can spend the night in the monastery parking lot. Keep the area clean!

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018
description: Parking of the sanctuary of Cura. In the monastery there are toilets, they can be closed at night. It has a restaurant and wonderful views of the entire island. The only drawback, the presence of mosquitoes, although in the parking lot in principle, there is less.

title: (07210) Castellitx de la Pau - Unnamed Road
title_short: (07210) Castellitx de la Pau - Unnamed Road

description: 4 picnic tables with a great view. Car park nearby. Overnight stay prohibited.

title: (07600) Palma - 1 Diseminado 8307- es Pil.lari
description: 4 hectares of land with common services (toilets, showers, electricity, water, sewage, collector). bike rental. 2 km from Playa del Arenal and the airport 4). 24 hours all year.Visit us on facebook.Camp4cycle. However, it is a problem to get onto the pitch! There was no one there. Friendly camper colleagues let us on the pitch.

title: (07639) Badia Gran - Unnamed Road
description: Siding next to a well paved country road although the road is somewhat sandy. They fit 3 normal vans or 1/2 large motorhomes. Very quiet place in the middle of the field where we spent a very quiet night.

title: (07600) El Arenal - 303 Diseminado Sector 6
description: Water intake next to the laundry room, it is a typical gas station tap but with enough pressure. Very nice staff who, when asked if they could fill the tank, responded: of course, that's what it's for!?

title: (07600) Llucmajor - 23 Carrer Antoni Galmés
description: Having lived in El Arenal for several years, I know that there was always this parking lot. Actually there are 3 parking lots and in them there is AC and vans too. This one is wider and is better inclined, it also has a fence that gives more security. IS FREE. We have spent several nights and super quiet.

title: (07260) Porreres - 29 Camí de Marina
description: Parking without prohibition signs to spend the night (for the moment). It is next to a playground, restaurant, supermarket, self-service laundry and bakery. There is also a charger for electric vehicles. Gas station 200 m away and pharmacy. Wifi and mobile charger.

title: (07600) El Arenal - 21 Carrer Balears
description: Cheap place to do laundry. I recommend it!

title: (07639) Llucmajor - 209 Diseminado Sector 4
description: Good place in the shade to rest, we made a stop to eat. Quiet and clean place even though it is close to the road. There is a toilet sign, but they are closed. In front at the crossroads there is a restaurant. We did not spend the night, but the site seemed very suitable for it, flat and very spacious terrain.

title: (07600) Palma - 3 Carrer Duna
description: Ballermann in 5 minutes, park in the head of a dead end

title: (07639) Sa Ràpita - Unnamed Road

title: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
title_short: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
description: Along the road. Spent a relatively quiet night. From 6:00 a.m. it gets loud with car traffic. Some relatively flat. You have to stand very close to the curb, otherwise you will be outside the markings. Megapark, Ballermann 6, Bierkönig, Upper Bavaria and the beach can all be reached in about 6 minutes on foot. There are restaurants nearby

title: (07630) Campos - 2 Carrer de Manacor

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 10B Carrer de l'Acàcia

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 3 Carrer Lledoner

title: (07639) Vallgornera -

title: (07630) Campos - 21 Carrer de Sant Blai

title: (07640) Colònia de Sant Jordi -

title: (07006) Palma - 24-28 Carrer del Callao
description: Parking in a dead end street, perfect for a restful night. He always has a place. Close to the port.

title: (07250) Vilafranca de Bonany - Unnamed Road
description: The Bonany Monastery car park offers a gravel parking space under trees for one to a maximum of two vans and many vacant straight asphalt parking spaces. It is very clean and there are some garbage cans. Here you are outside the monastery walls, which we much preferred to driving directly into a private area. There would also be parking spaces right next to a picnic area and the toilets. Especially since the monastery is inhabited and also offers rentals, it was not right for us to spend the night higher up directly under strange windows. The toilets are on the monastery grounds, 2-3 minutes from the lower parking lot.

title: (07006) Palma - 21 Carrer del Callao
description: Quiet parking, near the port

title: (07014) Palma - 3A Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Free public parking next to the restaurant. Next to the bike path of the Palma promenade

title: (07009) Palma - 529 Camí dels Reis
description: Free parking, very large, without services, only to spend the night near the green point that opens at 8 am

title: (07009) Palma - 12 Carrer Gremi Selleters i Basters
title_short: (07009) Palma - 12 Carrer Gremi Selleters i Basters
description: Simple exchange of repsol propane and butane bottles. Opening times Mon-Sun 7.30 a.m.-9.30 p.m.

title: (07009) Palma - 8 Diseminado 5318
description: Large Repsol gas station with LPG and car wash. Helpful staff and just nearby the recycling facility (one of the rare place where grey and black water disposal is possible). This gas station is one of the rare gas station on the island with LPG.

title: (07015) Palma - 44D Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Parking in the blue zone in front of the port, ideal if you have to board the ferry early in the morning Flat and quiet area You can use the port toilets, open all night and quite clean

title: (07360) Lloseta - 3 Carrer Sabaters
description: GALP service area with car wash, they have a hose,  and a small park for children to entertain themselves while you clean. It also has a bar to have a drink sitting at a table.

title: (07014) - 33A Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Free parking at the edge of the port, near the city center.

title: (07350) Binissalem - 60 Diseminado Poligono 15
description: Esplanade in the upper area of the town, field area with soccer field and basketball. In the area above there is a park and drinking water and going up the hill are the municipal facilities with a swimming pool, bar and showers. In summer you can shower and swim by paying a small amount. Starting point for excursions in the mountains.

title: (07014) Palma - 29 Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: All parking spaces along the Palma harbor are free.

title: (07014) Palma - 2B Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Free parking, with trees and lots of shade. Next to the main road, ie cars passing, for sensitive ears not good for sleeping (with earplugs all ok). A 28 minute walk to the cathedral.

title: (07010) Palma - Unnamed road
description: Parking in Palma with large Campers can be very complicated. This is a free Carrefour car park and also with large spaces. There is a bus stop with which you are in the heart of Palma in 20 mins.

title: (07015) Palma - 4 Carretera Dic de l'Oest
description: Free parking next to the port, next to cliff overlooking the sea.

title: (07520) Balearic Islands - 6013 Diseminado Sector Num 1
description: Drinking water at Repsol gas station

title: (07014) Palma - 45 Carrer Torrentó
description: Free public parking located in the Spanish village. Quiet at night and with the transit of cars during the day.

title: (07014) Palma - Carrer Castell de Bellver
description: Good site to visit the castle

title: (07015) Palma - 227 Avinguda de Joan Miró
description:
Very spacious place next to Palacio de Marivent wall.
Capacity for more than 40 vehicles. Shaded area and for all sizes and heights of Motorhomes.
Nearby supermarkets and Porto Pi Shopping Center next door. Good communication. Parking day and night.

title: (07010) Palma - 2 Carrer de Ramon Nadal
description: Parking near the monastery of La Real. There are a few motorhomes on site. Quiet place at night without noise

title: (07011) Palma - 10 Camí de Jesús
description: Drinking water.

title: (07014) Palma - 56 Disseminat 2201-Sa Taulera
description: Free parking. Mest supermarket.

title: (07009) Palma - 1 Urbanització Parcel·l Urbanización son Llompart
title_short: (07009) Palma - 1 Urbanització Parcel·l Urbanización son Llompart
description: Gas station where we could refill water without problem.

title: (07011) - 30 Diseminado 2801- Son Flor
description: It is a dissuasive parking used even by locals. There are several bus stops for different lines, both go to the city. At the top is number 8 and direction Decathlon, there is another stop. This is 10 minutes by bus or less from the center. And if you have bicycles, It is much better, since from here you access the bicycle lane and even the center...

title: (07691) Santanyí - 156 Diseminado Poligono 9
description: Incredible parking lot of the Sanctuary of the Virgen de la Consolación, a sanctuary located on top of a hill, perfectly preserved by the neighbors, a visit is essential, it is a viewpoint of the valley and the coast, it has good flat space, with shade, the The sanctuary remains open all day (it is closed at night) it has a drinking water source and clean public toilets, litter bins, there is no prohibition on access or overnight stays, wonderful. Access by 39.3904346, 3.1477667, abstain large AC's, narrow and curvy road. Please keep it clean.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 90 Carrer de Palma
description: Repsol station, free water. Fill the water tank without any problem.

title: (07300) Inca - 122 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Very good place to visit Inca, big esplanade and with trees for shade, if not busy there is a cupboard with a tap, a lot of cars and trucks etc there are room for everyone

title: (07500) Manacor - 1068 Diseminado Poligon 26
description: Propane and butane cylinders available, closed on Sundays

title: (07300) Inca - 50 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Economic Diesel station, non-potable water?, bathrooms, and car wash.

title: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
title_short: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
description: Street parking 700m from the Mirò museum and 50m from the stop for lines 46 and 47 which takes you to the port and downtown in 20 min. a bit busy but in the shade.

address.street: 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda

title: (07650) Santanyí - 5 Carrer de Campos
description: Automatic laundry. Schedule from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. LD. Automatic detergent machine, has change and can be paid with bills. Does not support card.

title: (07300) Inca - 7 Carrer de Salvador Espriu
description: Parking for the municipal swimming pool, next to a large playground for children, you can buy a pass for a few hours in the pool and the possibility of showers. There is a cafeteria right next to it and a starting area for the Tramuntana. Area with life during the day and at night, very quiet with police presence.

title: (07200) Felanitx - PMV-4011
description: Small parking lot on the road to the San Salvador Monastery. Relatively flat. Great view, quiet. Road up winding, not too steep, asphalt in very good condition. Please keep it clean! Sleeps 3-4 at night.

title: (07340) Alaró - 30 Plaça Clastra de son Togores
title_short: (07340) Alaró - 30 Plaça Clastra de son Togores
description: Public parking in Alaró, it is usually quite full

title: (07340) Alaró - 70 Ma-2100
description: Free parking, easy access, without services. Good option to spend a night.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 60C Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
title_short: (07650) Santanyí - 60C Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
description: Public parking, good place to spend the night, very quiet especially in winter, near the center of Santanyi. Only places for cars.

title: (07208) Felanich - PMV-4011
description: Day parking, picnic areas, no camping at the monastery

title: (07360) Lloseta - 1E Carrer Frederic García Lorca
description: Wide and quiet street in the upper part of Lloseta, right there is a small playground for children.

title: (07208) Es Carritxo - Unnamed Road
description: Last parking space before the hairpin bends!

title: (07650) Santanyí - 71C Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
title_short: (07650) Santanyí - 71C Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
description: Land parking more discreet than the parking lot next to it. this one is not lit and calm with an air of play just next to it. todo ben

title: (07650) Santanyí - 68 Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
title_short: (07650) Santanyí - 68 Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
description: Large, flat parking and only 5 min. walking from the center. Weekly market on Saturdays. Charming and very quiet town. All services in the immediate vicinity.

title: (07300) Inca - 106 Diseminado Poligono 6
description: Below the Ermita there is a large gravel / meadow area that is designated as a parking lot. There is a small playground at the Ermita and you have a beautiful view of Llubí. The environment is calm and we stood here all alone in December.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 29 Carrer des Convent
description: Non-potable water to fill the tank free.

title: (07650) Santanyí - 72A Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
title_short: (07650) Santanyí - 72A Carrer Bernat Vidal i Tomàs
description: Sports area. Local pool. Many parking possibilities.

title: (07181) Calvià - 43 Carretera Andratx
description: Free public parking 24h a 10min walk to the coves of Ses Illetes. Repsol next door with water and a picnic table. Quiet place to sleep.

title: (07208) Felanitx - 617 Diseminado Sexta Volta
description: Free night and day parking with unbeatable views.

title: (07181) Calvià - 3 Calle 823 Bendinat Centre
description: Municipal car park accessible 24 hours a day. Quiet at night. Large space available.

title: (07193) Sa Coma - 1A Carrer des Gessamí
description: Picnic air with parking It is not clear if we have the right to sleep here but so far no worries! Despite the train line next door, very quiet place! Some walkers from time to time but quiet.

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description:
Laundry with 14kg and 18kg machines and 5 tumble dryers. Open 365 days, from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.
Payable with coins, money changer available. Detergent (Ariel) is included in the price and will be added automatically - unfortunately you cannot use your own.

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description: Vacant lot on the immediate edge of the city, about ten minutes walk from the center, very well placed, extremely quiet. no service, but very practical

title: (07181) Calvià - 831 Carrer 831
description: Shaded parking area no problem to park beach at 1.4km

title: (07015) Palma -
description: Viewpoint with privileged views of Palma and the port. Quite quiet from 12:00 - 1:00 since cars usually come before to watch the sunset and be with friends. We spent a very quiet night here.

title: (07300) Inca - 57 Carrer Maó
description: Parking on the road. Very quiet area with 2 places. In front of a Children's Park and athletics track also with views of the Serra de Tramumtana 10 minutes from Inca on foot

title: (07120) Palma - Unnamed Road
description: Large parking lot on the university campus

title: (07500) Manacor - 42 Carrer Fusters
description: Ample public parking close to the city

title: (07300) Inca -
description: Picnic area about 1 km before sleeping. Fits a van. Several places available almost flat. Protected by trees.

title: (07300) Inca - 1 Diseminado Poligono 8
description: Butane and propane cylinders available

title: (07120) Palma - 1A Carrer Parc Bit-1
description: Car park. It is very close to the center of Palma and is a good place to sleep if you visit the city. There is nobody on weekends. Without services

title: (07300) Inca - Carretera de Santa Magdelena
description: Just beautiful

title: (07110) Bunyola - Carretera sa Comuna
description: Beautiful and quiet place on top of a mountain, you can get to this place from two sites and get some spectacular ones, seems like a good starting point for hiking. Closed from May 15 to October 15.

title: (07690) Santanyí - 6 Ma-6102
description: Parking space next to public space. Stall available during the day.

title: (07691) S'Alqueria Blanca -
description: Water point in the cemetery to fill bottles or cans. Plenty of room to park, and some shade

title: (07690) Cala Llombards - Camí de Cala Llombards
title_short: (07690) Cala Llombards - Camí de Cala Llombards
description: Sand parking without services

title: (07500) Manacor - 314 Poligono Poligon 34
description: A little place to spend the night. Some rubbish litter the ground and the few piles of rubble do not dream but the place is quiet to spend one or two nights of passage. The spot is located in the heights of Manacor. No services.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 740 Diseminado Poligono 7
description: Small parking area between two streets, little traffic.

title: (07500) Manacor - 17 Via Palma
description: Possibility to fill up with water (not drinkable)

title: (07369) Selva - Unnamed Road
description: Public park, with about 7 tables and grills to spend the day and it is possible to stay at night, access is by a dirt road with stones, but it can be done slowly and easily. Not very suitable for large caravans. lots of tree shade and place for hammocks

title: (07659) Cala Santanyí - 7B Carrer de na Cebriana
title_short: (07659) Cala Santanyí - 7B Carrer de na Cebriana
description: Parking at a playground up to 6m in length. I spent a quiet night there. It is less than a 5 minute walk to the beach. The viewpoint of the Pontas is also easy to reach.

title: (07659) Cala Santanyí - 34D Calle de Sa Costa dels Etics
title_short: (07659) Cala Santanyí - 34D Calle de Sa Costa dels Etics
description: Perfect place to visit Cala Santanyi, you have to arrive in the afternoon to get a good place under the pines, so the next day you have shade all day, the possibility of sleeping very quietly, a garbage area nearby and nearby restaurants and bars.

address.street: 34D Calle de Sa Costa dels Etics

title: (07659) Cala Santanyí - 6 Carrer es Coral
description: Quiet street, very well located to discover the beautiful city, bars nearby. recommendable

title: (07690) Cala Llombards - Carrer Internacional
description: Parking for cala lombardes. Quite broad. On the beach. There is a beach bar.

title: (07500) Manacor - 45 Via Palma
description: Repsol gas station with water filling service. With containers.

title: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes
title_short: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes
description: Public water point. If you use a "washing machine adaptor" (buy in most hardware shops) you can connect your hose directly to the tap.

title: (07181) Calvià - 156 Carretera Palma-andratx
description: Free public parking. Less than 15 minutes from the port of Palma. Part of the places have a roof that gives shade (here only small vans). There is a small shopping area very close, with restaurants. Still, it is quite quiet.
